The claim was made by former Sen: James Webb, D-Va., during an interview on ABC's This Week with host George Stephanopoulos on March 15, 2015.
The claim states that: the stock market has almost tripled since April of 2009."
The expert analyzed historical data and: the Dow Jones Industrial Average, the Standard & Poors 500, the NASDAQ Composite, and the Wilshire 5000.
